sources.description:
Experience this cult classic from visionary producer Roman Polanski and director Simon Hesera! Join Bernard (Mark Burns), a troubled man battling his demons, as he takes his resilient niece Winnie (Beatrice Edney) on a seaside trip that spirals into raw, unforgettable drama. Watch for comedy legend Peter Sellers in a sly cameo as a cheeky shopkeeper!
